product_name: The North Face Base Camp Mini Flip-Flops - Girls - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed using hyper-durable materials, the Base Camp Mini flip-flops from The North Face offer a lightweight-yet-rugged design for exploration or day-to-day wear and tear. Combining abrasion-resistant Hypalon(R) straps with cushy, egg crate-inspired footbeds, young feet stay comfortable thanks to sturdy arch support embedded into the footbed. Rubber outsoles. Closeout.
short_description: Designed using hyper-durable materials, the Base Camp Mini flip-flops from The North Face offer a lightweight-yet-rugged design for exploration or day-to-day wear and tear.
